flagDescription: A skull with a white upward-curved mustache resembling Whitebeard's famous facial hair, crossed by bones behind it.

statusHistory.reason: Mentioned as one of the most powerful pirate crews in the world

keyMoments.title: Whitebeard Pirates Mentioned
keyMoments.description: Smoker identifies Ace as the Second Division Commander of the Whitebeard Pirates, revealing the crew's existence and establishing them as a major power in the pirate world.
keyMoments.significance: First mention of one of the most powerful pirate crews in the One Piece world, foreshadowing their future importance to the story.

description: One of the most powerful and influential pirate crews in the One Piece world, led by Edward Newgate (Whitebeard), who is considered one of the Yonko (Four Emperors). The crew is organized into divisions, each led by a division commander. Ace serves as the 2nd Division Commander.
